bug.author: CaptainJL
bug.summary: How to close Quadrotor sim, without crashing Unreal
bug.description: Hey all, I am using Unreal on Ubuntu for Airsim. Everytime i hit 'esc' or try to shut down the simulation in quadrotor mode, Unreal crashes. This doesn't happen with car mode. Anyone know how to kill the unreal airsim simulation while in quadrotor mode, without it crashing? Thanks.

comments.comment: I am experiencing the same issue
If you run your simulation in standalone mode, even if the simulation crashes, the unreal editor will not crash.
